trans-unit.source: A base class for events associated with a <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication" /> .
trans-unit.target: Uma classe base para os eventos associados a um <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs> is also used in the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Unloaded%2A> handler of a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs> também é usado no <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Unloaded%2A> manipulador de um <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> instância.

trans-unit.source: The following code example inspects the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs> passed into the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Unloaded%2A> handler of a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> instance and displays the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs.InstanceId%2A> of the workflow that was unloaded.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o exemplo de código a seguir a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs> passado para o <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Unloaded%2A> manipulador de um <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> instância e exibe o <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs.InstanceId%2A> do fluxo de trabalho foi descarregado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of extensions of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de extensões do tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: O identificador exclusivo da instância do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The following code example inspects the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs> passed into the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Unloaded%2A> handler of a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> instance and displays the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs.InstanceId%2A> of the workflow that was unloaded.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o exemplo de código a seguir a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs> passado para o <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Unloaded%2A> manipulador de um <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> instância e exibe o <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs.InstanceId%2A> do fluxo de trabalho foi descarregado.
